title: Drawing, Bare Hill, Acropolis at Corinth, Greece, April 1869
title_raw: Bare Hill, Acropolis at Corinth, Greece
medium:
Recto: Graphite on green paper

Verso: Graphite, brush with white gouache on green paper
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, at top right:  2 Rich green / 3 Brownish grey / 4 Broken with green / and various shades of / brown; and with figures and "reddish" at various locations; and again at bottom right:  Acropolis at Corinth / [the date and] over.

Verso: Inscribed in graphite at various locations:  brown; and at bottom:  greenish / near Cephalonia / [the date] / 2 Dark rich Bt sienna / 3 lighter with red streaks / 4 greyer / 5 Brilliant white, delicate luminous shadows [line beneath].
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of a bare hill

Verso: Horizontal view at top of a coast line with a mountain range in the rear, foothills in the left foreground and a rock rising from the sea; and at bottom mountains rising behind a ridge, at left, vertically, with a steep rocky coast.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Bare Hill, Acropolis at Corinth, Greece, April 1869. Recto: Graphite on green paper

Verso: Graphite, brush with white gouache on green paper. 
Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-166
